title: Did President Barack Obama Putin congratulate him on winning in 2012?
subtitle: After President Donald Trump was criticized for congratulating Vladimir Putin on the results of the Russian elections, there were allegations that Obama had done the same in 2012.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: He congratulated President Obama Vladimir Putin on the results of Russia ' s elections in 2012, a diplomatic move for which President Trump had been criticized in 2018.
